#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int k=1;k<=t;k++)
    {
        cout<<"Case "<<k<<":"<<endl;
        int n ;
        int m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        vector<int> d;
        d.resize(n);
        double temp;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>temp;
            d[i] = (int)(temp*100 +  0.5);
        }
        sort(d.begin(),d.end());
        for(int j=1;j<=m;j++)
        {
            cout<<"Scenario "<<j<<":"<<endl;
            cin>>temp;
            int x =(int)(temp*100 +  0.5);
            for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
            {
                if(x >= d[i])
                {
                    if(d[i]<100)
                    cout<<d[i]/100<<"."<<(d[i]/10)%10<<d[i]%10<<" "<<x/d[i]<<endl;
                    else
                    cout<<d[i]/100<<" "<<x/d[i]<<endl;
                    x = x%d[i];
                }
            }
        }
        
    }
    
   return 0;
}
